thread.title: Is that Rowan Atkinson on the set of the Love Actually sequel?
thread.title_full: Is that Rowan Atkinson on the set of the Love Actually sequel?

author: Eleanor Bley Griffiths
title: Is that Rowan Atkinson on the set of the Love Actually sequel?
text:
Is that Rowan Atkinson on the set of the Love Actually sequel? Rufus from the jewellery counter seems to have found his way to Sainsbury's ARTICLE CONTINUES BELOW 
By Eleanor Bley Griffiths Thursday 23 February 2017 at 12:34PM 
Emma Freud has been teasing us all day with cryptic photos as she and her team film scenes for the Red Nose Day special in Sainsbury's (of all places), but now we think we know what is going on: Rowan Atkinson is the mystery star on set! 
Look at the back of that head. It has to be Atkinson as Rufus the jewellery counter salesman, with his terribly slow gift-wrapping skills. — Red Nose Day (@rednoseday) February 23, 2017 
This revelation also makes sense of earlier shots featuring onlookers gathered outside the shop. If Atkinson is behind the counter, no wonder there's an outrageously long queue to check out. The extras. #rednosedayactually shoot. Can't quite see the star yet.... pic.twitter.com/EltJjslJm6 — emma freud (@emmafreud) February 23, 2017 
Just imagine it. "This isn't a bag, sir. This is so much more than a bag. It's a Bag for Life!"
